#include <iostream>
#include <math.h>
#define ll int
using namespace std;

int main() 
{
	ll t,n,i;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>n;
		long long sum=1;
        for(i=2;i<=sqrt(n);i++){
            if(n%i==0){
                if(i==n/i)
                    sum+=i;
                else
                    sum+=i+(n/i);
            }
        }
        cout<<sum<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
